short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the option to suppress the download tray or add a keyboard shortcut (default Alt+K) to close it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that adds a "close download tray" keyboard shortcut to Chrome, along with an option to prevent the tray from appearing in the first place.
